name: Spaghetti alla Carbonara
description: Spaghetti in a creamy sauce made with egg, prosciutto, sautéed onions, Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

name: Penne Terra E Mare
description: Penne sautéed with clams, mussels, scallops, shrimp, mushrooms, peas and diced tomatoes.

name: Spaghetti Alla Puttanesca
description: Spaghetti in a diced tomato, anchovies, capers, Kalamata olives and red pepper sauce.

name: Linguime ai frutti di Mare
description: Linguine, tossed with freshly sautéed seafood in a white wine or marinara sauce.
